author: customer
text: I ordered a Gucci bracelet. It's so tiny that it would not fit an 8 year old child!! Now I have to just through all the hoops to return it. The Real Real has lost a customer. Very, very disappointed.
title: Horrible bracelet

author: customer
text: The size of the item I purchased was completely inaccurate.  The description stated the dress was a size “large”, but when I received the item - it was an EU size 42 or a U.S. size 6.  I do not consider a size 6 to be a large.  Needless to say, I had to return the item, at my cost.  Sadly, this is not the first time I have had this experience.
title: The size of the item I purchased was…widely inaccurate.

author: Madeline
text: Handbag is in much worse condition than advertised. It smells terrible and anything I put in it also smells. This lining is crumbling/peeling and gets all over everything.

author: KES
text: Your customer service is lacking at best. No live person was available at all, ever. You lost a sale, my future business, any consignments from me,, and definitely a strong recommendation to everyone I know NOT to use your company.

text: Purchased 4 items and one of them was quite dirty on the sleeves of the sweater. Would have been nice to receive cleaned items, even if they are used.
title: Mostly satisfied, one dirty sweater.

author: JH
text: Not likely to purchase from this site again. My first purchase was a LV purse.  It was not in as good of condition as I had anticipated and I’m not convinced it’s authentic.  I would have liked the option to return or at very least exchange for a different item.
title: Not likely to purchase from this site…

author: customer
text: Very good service but got a fake prada bag. Was however able to send it back and get a full refund and they sent me a UPS-label to ship it back. So the money i lost was about 150$ to recive the package from UPS.
title: Very good service but got a fake prada…

author: customer
text:
The item was not as described. The dimensions were significantly off, and as it is a handbag, it is not returnable. The box was badly damaged and partly open when it was delivered as well. 

I won’t be shopping here again.
title: The item was not as described

author: customer
text: The item was received as described; however, I would have preferred to know that there was a weak stem. It would have made a difference in my decision to purchase it.  Also note, I was a bit disappointed with the cleanliness.
title: More Details Please...
